message: Can you exclude files from Find File or provide some smarts for favouring source files over compiled .class or .pyc files?

so just set it to (^\.|\.class|\.pyc)
hidden_files_pattern: in the project_plugin.yaml is a regexp for files that should be hidden in the tree
